prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.parsha_theme: dreams, building from nothing, divine protection
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who guides the steps of man — direct my path today.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 1:3: "He is like a tree planted by streams of water, yielding fruit in season."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 10:4: "A slack hand causes poverty, but the hand of the diligent makes rich."
prayer.intention: Help me lead with integrity. Let my yes be yes and my no be no.
prayer.closing: Baruch atah Adonai — Blessed are You, Lord, who renews creation daily with goodness.

family.title: ❤️ Family Focus
recommendations: PRIORITY: Focus on repair. Acknowledge recent conflicts without defending.
Increase acts of service dramatically this week.
Create space for her to express frustrations without fixing.
family.todays_action: It's Sunday — put your phone away for 30 minutes after the kids go to bed and give Jillian your full attention. No agenda, no fixing. Just be present.

items.headline: Gaza ceasefire Phase 2 stalled: Negotiations for the second phase — intended to release all remaining hostages and end the war — were supposed to begin in February but have not materialized. Rafah crossing reopened with limited access last week.
All hostages from Phase 1 returned: Final deceased hostage Ran Gvili returned to Israel. Trump visited the Knesset celebrating the Phase 1 achievement, calling it 'the end of an age of terror.'

Appeals court upholds immigration detention policy: Federal court ruled that individuals arrested under immigration enforcement may be held in mandatory detention, reinforcing the administration's border security framework.
DNI Gabbard faces scrutiny over intelligence handling: Questions surrounding the handling of a sensitive intelligence intercept continue to generate discussion in Washington.
Big Tech AI capex forecast: $650B in 2026: Apple, Google, Meta, and Microsoft collectively plan staggering infrastructure spending, primarily on AI data centers and compute capacity.
Polymarket tracking China-Taiwan risk: Prediction markets actively pricing geopolitical scenarios including potential China-Taiwan conflict by end of 2026.
Anthropic launches Cowork AI legal tool — triggered $285B software stock selloff as investors priced in AI automation of legal work (contract review, NDA triage, compliance workflows).
Claude Opus 4.6 released — improved agentic coding, 1M context window, multi-agent task delegation in Claude Code. The model you're hearing this from right now.
Apple adds Anthropic + OpenAI agents to Xcode — agentic coding now built into Apple's IDE, supporting Claude Agent and OpenAI Codex.
Alphabet resets AI infrastructure bar — massive 2026 capex for Google DeepMind compute capacity and cloud customer demand.
